narrative_osint.incident_summary: A 10-year-old female was last seen at Norfolk at 2025-09-28T01:06:26.763944+00:00. The child was reported missing by neighbor after failing to meet a friend.

narrative_osint.movement_cues_text: Within 4 hours of disappearance, movement cues merged onto I-64 west toward Richmond suggest travel east toward Tidewater along I-95. A silver 2018 Nissan Altima was observed departing near Norfolk, Virginia.

witness_accounts.description: Around 1 hours later, a school_staff reported someone matching the description (10-year-old female, wearing long-sleeve black shirt, black joggers, white sneakers) near King George.

provenance._fulltext: A 10-year-old female was last seen at Norfolk at 2025-09-28T01:06:26.763944+00:00. The child was reported missing by neighbor after failing to meet a friend. Within 4 hours of disappearance, movement cues merged onto I-64 west toward Richmond suggest travel east toward Tidewater along I-95. A silver 2018 Nissan Altima was observed departing near Norfolk, Virginia. Around 1 hours later, a school_staff reported someone matching the description (10-year-old female, wearing long-sleeve black shirt, black joggers, white sneakers) near King George.
